verses.text: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* sittest \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: thou \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: Execute judgement \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w him|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* oppressed \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w oppressor|strong="H3238"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* afflict \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* \w oppress|strong="H3238"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* unjustly: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w then|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* race \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* myself, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w desolation|strong="H2723"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda: Thou art \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* Galaad \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Libanus: \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7896"\w* thee \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* habitable.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6942"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w destroyer|strong="H7843"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* thy chosen \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* headlong \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* hath \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* forsaken \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* adored strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* bemoan \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* tears: lament \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* goeth \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w native|strong="H4138"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Sellum \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Josias \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w instead|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: \w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* hither \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w removed|strong="H1540"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* buildeth \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w by|strong="H5414"\w* injustice, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w chambers|strong="H5944"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* judgement: \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* oppress \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w wages|strong="H6467"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0559"\w* saith: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w me|strong="H4886"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* wide \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w large|strong="H1004"\w* \w chambers|strong="H5944"\w*: \w who|strong="H0559"\w* openeth \w to|strong="H0559"\w* himself \w windows|strong="H2474"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* maketh roofs \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* painteth \w them|strong="H4886"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w vermilion|strong="H8350"\w*.

Shalt thou \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou comparest thyself \w to|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*? \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H0001"\w* \w then|strong="H0227"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H0001"\w* \w him|strong="H0398"\w*?

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* judged \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cause|strong="H1779"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* own \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* because \w he|strong="H1931"\w* knew \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*?

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w set|strong="H6213"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* covetousness, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w shedding|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* running \w after|strong="H5921"\w* evil \w works|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w concerning|strong="H0413"\w* Joakim \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Josias \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda: \w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*, \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*: \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lament|strong="H5594"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w*, \w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* noble \w one|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3389"\w* \w shall|strong="H8179"\w* \w be|strong="H3389"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w with|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H7993"\w* \w burial|strong="H6900"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w an|strong="H7993"\w* ass, rotten \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* forth without \w the|strong="H7993"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* Libanus, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*: \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w lift|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H7665"\w* Basan, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* pass \w by|strong="H3605"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* \w are|strong="H5927"\w* destroyed.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0413"\w* thy properity: \w and|strong="H6963"\w* thou saidst: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*: \w this|strong="H2088"\w* hath \w been|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy pastors, \w and|strong="H0954"\w* thy \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* shall go into \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*: \w and|strong="H0954"\w* \w then|strong="H0227"\w* shalt thou \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w*, \w and|strong="H0954"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*.

Thou \w that|strong="H0935"\w* sittest \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Libanus, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* makest thy \w nest|strong="H7077"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*, \w how|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou mourned \w when|strong="H0935"\w* sorrows \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* thee, \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w pains|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* woman \w in|strong="H3427"\w* labour?

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* Jechonias \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Joakim \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* ring \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* pluck \w him|strong="H5921"\w* thence.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* thou fearest, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Nabuchodonosor \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* send thee, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* thee, \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* strange \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, whereunto \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w mind|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* thither.
